Package fr.cnrs.iees.uit.indexing

Class BoundedRegionIndexingTree<T>

java.lang.Object
fr.cnrs.iees.uit.indexing.AbstractIndexingTree<T,​fr.cnrs.iees.uit.indexing.RegionIndexingNode<T>>
fr.cnrs.iees.uit.indexing.RegionIndexingTree<T>
fr.cnrs.iees.uit.indexing.BoundedRegionIndexingTree<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of objects indexed
All Implemented Interfaces:
IndexingTree<T,​fr.cnrs.iees.uit.indexing.RegionIndexingNode<T>>, Dimensioned, fr.ens.biologie.generic.Sizeable
public class BoundedRegionIndexingTree<T> extends RegionIndexingTree<T>

A region-based k-d tree where the size of the initial region is known and used to initialise the tree root node.

NOTE: Compared to ExpandingRegionIndexingTree, this implementation does not make any assumption on the length of the indexed region in all dimensions: 'hyper-rectangular' domains can be used.

Author:
Jacques Gignoux - 06-09-2018
